sudoku.clp

Class CLPBoardGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.clp.CLPBoardGenerator

  • public class CLPBoardGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to generate random solved sudoku board. The other solving strategies could also be used to serve this purpose, but this was easiest to implement. And CLP is fast enough, so no need to get crazy will speeding this up.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SudokuBoard getRandomBoard(int p, int q)
      Returns a random fully solved sudoku board.
      static SudokuBoard getRandomBoard(SudokuBoard board)
      Returns a new random fully solved sudoku board using the given board as a starting point.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomBoard

        public static SudokuBoard getRandomBoard(int p,
                         int q)
        Returns a random fully solved sudoku board.
        Parameters:
        p - the small box width
        q - the small box height
        Returns:
        a solved sudoku

      • getRandomBoard

        public static SudokuBoard getRandomBoard(SudokuBoard board)
        Returns a new random fully solved sudoku board using the given board as a starting point. All cells in the original board are kept.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to solve
        Returns:
        a solved version of the board, or null if unsolvable
